greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = sigma(n) - 4*phi(n).
reference: D. S. Mitrinovic et al., Handbook of Number Theory, Kluwer, p. 88.
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) vector(80, n, sigma(n) - 4*eulerphi(n)) \\ _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 19 2019
(MAGMA) [DivisorSigma(1, n) - 4*EulerPhi(n): n in [1..80]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 19 2019
(Sage) [sigma(n,1) - 4*euler_phi(n) for n in (1..80)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 19 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jan 23 2003
